page.title: 15 WORKING AND TRAVELLING.
page.content: We have been finding out about the kind of{jobs}that {parents}of the 60 children in our school do.Among the parents of children in our school, 67 have jobs and 29 do not work or are unemployed.Some children have only one parent, and parents are counted once only even if they have more than one child in the school. The{jobs}are:- Office worker(17), Farming (8), Cleaner(6), Teacher(6), Builder(6), Manual Worker(4), Home Crafts(3), Dinner Lady(2), Electrician (2), Doctor(2), Nurse(2), Security(2), Social Work(1). These are their{places of work:-}Bath (16), Monkton Farleigh(15), Trowbridge (11), Bradford-on-Avon, Westbury(2), Devizes(2), London(2), various(11). This is{how they travel:-}walking(17), own car(42), shared car(4), bicycle(2),motorbike(1), bus(2).
